```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(purrr)

```


```{r}
#| label: data-frame-likes

caminho_pasta <- "Dados/likes"

df_likes <- list.files(path = caminho_pasta, pattern = "\\.rds$", full.names = TRUE) |>
  map(readRDS) |>
  list_rbind()

head(df_likes)
```
